text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Dia, I… I was totally clueless. About what it means to run at Tracen 
Academy, and probably about everything else too.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Kita…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I pictured myself training and growing stronger… and winning lots of 
glamorous races! I fully believed I could do it if I just worked hard 
enough.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
But I never imagined what that "hard work" would actually look like, 
or how much of it I'd need to put in if I really wanted to win.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Teio overcomes all those challenges and keeps on running. That's 
what makes her so strong and incredible.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Yeah… You're right.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
To become someone like her… Do I really have what it takes to push 
myself that far?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Do I really have what it takes to put a smile on people's faces?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
I know what you mean—it's a scary thing. We just learned how tough 
the racing world really is, after all.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: You feel the same?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: I thought I had the necessary resolve, but I was just being naive.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Still, you know what? I think we're going to be just fine!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Because I'm right beside you, Kita!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Do you remember what Nature told us before? The thing you need to 
become a shining star…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, sorry. Yeah—I'm talking about the protagonists of the 
academy. You'll see Teio and McQueen aren't the only shining stars 
here.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Everyone here has dreams and the raw skills to see them through. It's 
a hearty full-course feast of protagonists, each with their own rivals!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Dreams, skills… and rivals.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Kita, you're a very precious friend to me… but you're just as precious 
to me as a rival!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Remember when we first met? That day, you had come to help with 
some volunteer work.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
You were the first Umamusume my age I had ever talked to, so I was 
really nervous.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
And I was surprised that there was someone out there faster than me! 
It really opened my eyes!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
After that, you took me to lots of new places. You taught me so many 
things, like how to play the games at the candy shop and how to take 
a tumble.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
You led the way as we ran together, opening my eyes to the vastness 
of the world around us. Staring at your back in front of me, I came to 
realize something.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: I wanted to surpass you—to take the lead myself.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Dia…

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
For as long as I've known you, you've always loved helping people. 
Maybe you were just showing me the same kindness.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: But it was different for me. I've always seen you as a rival.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
It's true that the other students here are incredible. No matter how 
hard we work, we may never catch up to them. But even so…

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
As long as you're running ahead of me, I won't stop trying to overtake 
you. I'll keep improving until I can.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: So let's keep running together, Kita. From now until forever!

text_block_list.name: Young Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Cross my heart and hope to die. Together forever, you and I!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
(That's right. From the first time I met Dia, I knew she was different 
from my other friends.)

text_block_list.name: Young Satono
text_block_list.text: I'm going to win a G1 race and make everyone's dream come true!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
(She was naive and a little detached, but she never cried when she 
fell. And she was always upfront and honest to me about her dreams.)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
(No matter how hard I tried to sprint ahead, she always stuck close 
behind. Eventually, we wound up running side by side.)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: (It was frustrating… and it made me want to get better.)

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Thanks, Dia. I guess I let my worries get the better of me.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
But having a rival to push you in the right direction… That's such an 
inspiring thought!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Kita…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I may not know everything about dreams or what it means to run—or 
even my own potential. But still…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I have a rival to run alongside me.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
That's why no matter how tough things get, I'll be okay. I can smile 
and overcome any obstacle with you by my side, Dia!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but I should warn you—I won't let you catch up to me during 
races! So you'd better be ready!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
…! 
Same here! I don't plan on losing!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Someday, I'm gonna become a stronger version of myself and achieve 
my dreams…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Because I've decided to chase them with you!
